span.span: GOOD PEOPLE ~ GOOD SCHOOL ~ GREAT COMMUNITY
Shared Values ~ Authentic Teaching ~ Personalized Environments

In our effort to improve communication, Peavine School has implemented a telephone broadcast system that enable personnel to notify all households and individuals by phone within minutes of an emergency or unplanned event. this service may also be used from time-to-time communication general announcements or reminders. Peavine School urges all Parents to leave an updated phone number in the main office (918) 696-7818.

p.span: During inclement weather, school closings and notifications will be announced in the following way:
On School telephone messenger system when applicable. NOT before 7am or after 9pm.
